text: If the applicant agrees to construct or rehabilitate affordable housing pursuant to § 1-306.33(1), the applicant may satisfy this agreement in any manner chosen by the applicant, including but not limited to a joint venture, partnership, contract, or arrangement with another party to develop the required housing.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 5-76, see notes following § 1-306.31.

For Law 12-275, see notes following § 1-306.31.

DC CODE § 1-306.35

Current through December 11, 2012

part.text: Housing Linkage Requirement of the Housing Element.
